entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is getting ready for a Quidditch match.

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: Harry's broomstick, which he uses to play Quidditch.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: A cat that belongs to Hermione Granger, who is suspiciously acting like a rat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend, who thinks Crookshanks is a rat.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Ron's pet rat, which Harry suspects might be an Animagus.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: A fifth-year student who is mentioned as being in the corridor.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: The sport that Harry and his friends play on broomsticks.

relationships.description: Harry owns the Nimbus Two Thousand broomstick, which he uses to play Quidditch.
Harry tells Crookshanks to go and chase mice, rather than Scabbers.
Ron owns the pet rat Scabbers.
Harry plays Quidditch, a sport that is being threatened by the storm.
